attributes.action: Introduce enviromental skills to the national curriculum along side literacy etc to educate the next generation about the threat we all face
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the Stern Report 2006 and the Climate report 2007 both tell us all in no uncertain terms that global warming is a threat. there is time but unless we act soon many species, including our own face massive survival problems in the future. it is now time to introduce Enviromental studies as part of a Key Skills initiative that would be part of the national curriculum so we can educate our children on issues such as recycling, global warming, and energy efficency.
